original_title: 不知所云，不知所终——李红旗及其影像世界
overview: In this talk, Li Hongqi reviewed his transition from fine art to cinema, and his aesthetic and philosophical exploration from his early 'So Much Rice' to recent 'The The'. Dir. Li Hongqi also shared his strong anxiety of his existence(born with melancholia), his thought on cinema art (actually, I don't think there's any movie worth making), his epistemology, his religious view, his consideration on contemporary cinema, and what he learned about living in seclusion.
title: TALKING UNKNOWN, ENDING UNKNOWN: LI HONGQI AND HIS CINEMA WORLD
